title: Job Training Program for Strengthening Textbook Analysis Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic curriculum design principles and social studies content knowledge
context.additional_context: Establishment of small-group breakout sessions and real-time feedback systems to promote collaborative activities among learners

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze content components of social studies textbooks and evaluate their pedagogical suitability
Learners can identify cognitive/perceptual conflict elements in textbooks and propose effective instructional strategies
Learners can produce project deliverables presenting textbook revision/supplementation plans applicable to real classroom settings
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
